page2.pageText: Frozen is a great movie. I loved to watch it.

page3.pageText: This is Elsa. She is a beautiful queen. She rule over Arendale.

page4.pageText: This is Anna, Elsa's sister. She is very brave and saved Elsa and the castle.

page5.pageText: This is Kristoff and his moose named Sven. They helped Anna to save the day. The are good friends and very kind people.

page6.pageText: This is Olaf, a magical walking talking snowman created by Elsa's magical powers. He is very lovely and cute. I like him very much!

page7.pageText: This is Hans. He is a prince from a neighboring kingdom. He pretended to be good, but inside he is a very bad person. He tried to kill Elsa, but failed. I do not like him at all.

page8.pageText: These are the trolls. They are magical creatures and knows a lot about magical stuff. They helped Anna's parents when she was little, and helped Kristoff and Anna to know each other.

page9.pageText: This is the fire spirit. It brought fire to the forest, but when it is not scared, he could be so cute and cuddly.
